subject.topic: U.S. Army campaigns of the War of 1812

mods.abstract: Standing portrait of Winfield Scott in military uniform. One hand in his jacket and the other resting on a column having a curtain draped on it. Beside him is a table and chair. On top of the table is Scott's hat. Winfield Scott Photograph by Brady expressly for this work.
mods.accessCondition: While TSLA houses an item, it does not necessarily hold the copyright on the item, nor may it be able to determine if the item is still protected under current copyright law.
